title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama CLI and server to pull, run, and manage large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama with Node and browser support.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama models (chat, embed, tools).

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, models, settings, RAG, voice).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with streaming, embeddings, and tool support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI for Ollama written in Go with chat history and model search.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-like inline completions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration for Ollama generators and embedders.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with chat, embeddings, and tool calling.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker Compose stacks for CPU & GPU Ollama deployments.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-gpt4all-ui
summary: GPT4All UI that also connects to local Ollama instances for chat and plugins.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that chats with Ollama models and supports slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings Ollama models into channels with @ mentions.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to spin up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered apps.

title: ollama-huggingface
summary: Convert & push Hugging Face models to Ollama registry in one CLI command.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake for reproducible Ollama builds with CUDA/ROCm overlays.
